_instructions: Copy this file to 'config.json' and customize your settings
_target_path_note: Auto-detected path to FM26 StandaloneWindows64 folder (usually auto-filled)
_enabled_mods_note: List of currently enabled mod names (managed automatically)

_tracking_security_note: No GitHub tokens needed! Download tracking is handled securely by the tracking API.
